name: Update Game Cloudant
info: Update or add a new doc to Cloudant.

name: Grab Last Game File from Cloudant
info:
Goal has been scored. Check the totalGames 
doc to see how many games there are.  Grab
last game file where _id equals the totalGames.
Pull the details for last game and proceed.

name: End the Game
info:
Repeating node to set the gameActive state to false,
set an end time, and prepare a web socket message.

name: Update totalGames for goal and wins
Update Player on New Game Login
Verify Player is Not Duplicate and Prepare to Update Game Files
info:
Subflow creates a new Player in the players database
if a player does not exist.  The flow then follows the check
for active game and old game logic before preparing to set a player
for the chosen team. If the player is a duplicate login the flow will
bypass processing.

name: Update Players Last Game Played Attribute on Rematch
info: Add one to the game and update the player to reflect a new last game.

name: Update totalGames
info:
A basic format payload and update the total games file
without a request to pull from the database.

name: Set Cloudant Update Command
func:
gameID = global.get("gameID").toString();

msg.payload = {
  "_id": gameID,
  "_rev":global.get("rev"),
  "userTeamOne": global.get("userTeamOne"),
  "idTeamOne": global.get("idTeamOne"),
  "userTeamOnePhoto": global.get("userTeamOnePhoto"),
  "userTeamTwo": global.get("userTeamTwo"),
  "idTeamTwo": global.get("idTeamTwo"),
  "userTeamTwoPhoto": global.get("userTeamTwoPhoto"),
  "goalsTeamOne": global.get("goalsTeamOne"),
  "goalsTeamTwo": global.get("goalsTeamTwo"),
  "startTime": global.get("startTime"),
  "endTime": global.get("endTime"),
  "lastBall": global.get("lastBall"),
  "currentBall":global.get("currentBall"),
  "gameActive": global.get("gameActive"),
}

return msg;

name: Grab Total Games

Goal Team Two
Goal Team One
Game Not Active Set Defaults
End the Game

Set Team One as Winner
func:
msg.payload = {"type":"gameWon","score_TeamOne":global.get("goalsTeamOne"),"score_TeamTwo":global.get("goalsTeamTwo"),"team":1};
return msg;

name: Set Team Two as Winner
func:
msg.payload = {"type":"gameWon","score_TeamOne":global.get("goalsTeamOne"),"score_TeamTwo":global.get("goalsTeamTwo"),"team":2};
return msg;

name: Set Team One as Shooter
func:
msg.payload = {"type":"goal","score_TeamOne":global.get("goalsTeamOne"),"score_TeamTwo":global.get("goalsTeamTwo"),"shooter":global.get("userTeamOne"),"team":1};
return msg;

name: Set Team Two as Shooter
func:
msg.payload = {"type":"goal","score_TeamOne":global.get("goalsTeamOne"),"score_TeamTwo":global.get("goalsTeamTwo"),"shooter":global.get("userTeamTwo"),"team":1};
return msg;

name: Set gameFile
func:
gameID = global.get("gameID").toString();

msg.payload = {
  "_id": gameID,
  "userTeamOne": global.get("userTeamOne"),
  "idTeamOne": global.get("idTeamOne"),
  "userTeamOnePhoto": global.get("userTeamOnePhoto"),
  "userTeamTwo": global.get("userTeamTwo"),

  "startTime": global.get("startTime"),
  "endTime": global.get("endTime"),
  "lastBall": global.get("lastBall"),
  "currentBall": global.get("currentBall"),
  "gameActive": global.get("gameActive"),
}



return msg;

Format Web Page

name: Grab Players from Cloudant and Calculate Stats
Calculate Probability Using Player or totalGames Data
info:
If both players are logged in, then goals for each team are pulled from the goalsFor property of the player file.  
If only one player is logged in then their goalsFor and goalsAgainst are used. 
If no players are logged in then use overall game stats from totalGames file.

name: Format Tweet
func:
msg.payload="Gooooooooooooal! @"+msg.payload.handle+" scores with "+global.get("goalsTeamTwo")+" points!"
return msg;

name: Format Tweet
func:
msg.payload="Gooooooooooooal! @"+msg.payload.handle+" scores with "+global.get("goalsTeamOne")+" points!"
return msg;

name: Tweet with No Second Player
func:
msg.payload="Congrats on the Foosbuzz win @"+global.get("handleOne")+"! That's "+global.get("winsOne")+" wins! Better luck next time "+global.get("userTeamTwo");
return msg;

name: Set Globals for Player
Tweet with Second Player
func:
msg.payload="Congrats on the Foosbuzz win @"+global.get("handleOne")+"! That's "+global.get("winsOne")+" wins! Better luck next time @"+msg.payload.handle;
return msg;

name: Set Globals for Player
Tweet with No Second Player

func:

name: Game Not Active

info:
If a player is new, add the player to the Players database.

new game and add the player to it.  If game is active add the player
to replace a null login.
